Title: Export Data selects all data for the whole year, and cannot be filtered by Quarters
Repro Steps: Description: Export Data selects all data for the whole year, and cannot be filtered by Quarters  steps to reproduce: as admin user go to Medical Expenses Open Inspect mode Click Export Data with the selected year check the excel file, all the quarters are selected filters on are only for the Page, but are missing filters for Exporting data  PFA video in attachment section   And Quarters should be queried quarters range, not PeriodType
Acceptance Criteria: Actual result: All Quarters for the entire year are selected in excel file   Expected result:  From Export Data button to be filters: for :  Year,  Quarter,  Status: "Submitted", "Approved", "Partially Approved"- (to be hidden)  Quarters should be queried quarters range, not PeriodType

Title: Budget - when adding new available amount for employee, it subtracts from Current Extra amount
Repro Steps: Description: Budget - when adding new available amount for employee, it subtracts from Current Extra amount  Steps to reproduce: precondition: to submit an expense with the whole available sum, so 0 amount is available  as admin navigate to Budget type the employee name add new value observe current extra amount being subtracted    PFA video in attachment section
Acceptance Criteria: actual result: It is allowed to subtract from the next year  expected result: It is not allowed to subtract from the next year, but Current extra amount should remain same

Title: Budget - the amount is updated for all years, not for selected year only
Repro Steps: Description: Budget - the sum is updated for all years, not for selected year only. And years should be seen 1 year in advance only.  Steps to reproduce: login as Admin go to Budget Check the dropdown for years, there are more then 1 year in advance update for a specific year the amount check for all years the same amount is updated  PFA video in attachment section
Acceptance Criteria: Actual: same amount is updated for all years and the re are more then 1 year in advance in the dropdown  expected result: the amount is updated only for the year selected, only 1 year in advance should be seen in dropdown

Title: Budget - Employee field doesn't have validation message
Repro Steps: Description: Employee field doesn't have validation message when the employee was found then cleared from the field and only amount is added.  steps to reproduce: as admin go to budget  type and find an employee in the employee field remove the employee name Open Inspect mode type only the amount click save there is no validation message, but the amount was saved for employee ID found previously   PFA video in attachment section
Acceptance Criteria: actual result: there is no validation message for employee field, but the amount was saved for employee ID found previously   expected result: validation message for employee field current extra amount is not changed or influenced by adding another available amount

Other existing tags can be found for Stock images section About Uploaded images section its is not working the search bar, Question: for this section do we need it (will there be some other tags and the user can add the tags to the uploaded pictures)? Title: The Text is not editable when the CS is still creating, only can be editable after it was saved in View mode

Title: Extract Data for Medical Expense behavior
Repro Steps: Description: Admin is not able to scroll down the extract modal  and see the Download button when user is selecting the Quarters filter The modal is not closing automatically when the user is downloading the extract  Steps to reproduce: PFA video in attachment section  about Excel file, the Quarter column is ok to be all Quarters in same column
Acceptance Criteria: Actual result: The extract modal is not able to scroll down and see the Download button when user is selecting the Quarters filter The modal is not closing automatically when the user is downloading the extract  Expected result: Admin is able to scroll down the extract modal and see the Download button when user is selecting the Quarters filter The modal is closing automatically when the user is downloading the extract

Title: Edit Case Study: Case Study Title has no text limit
Repro Steps: Environment: dev Browsers: Chrome Resolutions/devices: PC Area(s): Edit Case Study Phase bug was detected: testing Project activity at the moment of detection: system testing Root cause (educated guess): insufficient details in requirements Reproducible: Yes Description: Case Study title has no characters limit so that may lead to formatting issues Preconditions: have a case study in Steps to reproduce:    Have a case study in edit mode   Click edit on Case Study title   Write or paste a real long text   Click Save  Expected result: With a limit text cannot be too long to break the page formatting Actual result: Really long text saved and broke page formatting, Edit button is unavailable for Case Study title Notes: -- Evidence/Attachments:

Title: Edit Case Study: Results Section - no limits for numbers and descriptions
Repro Steps: Environment:  dev Browsers: Chrome Resolutions/devices: PC, Area(s): Edit Case Study Project activity at the moment of detection: system testing Root cause (educated guess): insufficient details in requirements Reproducible: Yes Description: in Results Section numbers and descriptions can be edited with no character limits, this may lead to formatting issues Preconditions: have a Case Study Steps to reproduce:    Place a Case Study in edit mode   Edit numbers and their descriptions in Results section  Expected result: Metric can receive numbers and % only, is limited and has no editor options (bold, italic, etc.), Description has character limit so it does not break section formatting Actual result: Metric has no limitation and allows letters and other symbols can be formatted, Description Has no text limit Notes: -- Evidence/Attachments:

Title: Filtering Location per Center in Team building expense is returning only Other locations
Repro Steps: Filtering Location per Center in Team building expense is returning only Other locations PFA video in attachments section
Acceptance Criteria: actual result: Filtering Location per Center in Team building expense is returning only Other locations  expected behavior: Ordered alphabetically starting with other, list doesn't change. "Other" locations shall be first in the list if the country is same as for the selected center Shall be listed only locations related to the Center Office selected (eg: Center office is in Moldova -> Listed locations shall be only from Moldova) filtered by country of the location(ignoring the cities)

Title: For Other Expenses (beside Per Diem) the Date greater then 25th of the current month is enabled
Repro Steps: For Other Expenses (beside Per Diem) the Date greater then 25th of the current month is enabled  PFA video for steps to reproduce  Shall be checked these scenarios when the current month is less then 25th day of the month (when 25th is enabled, all dates after are disabled)   when the current month is greater then 25th day of the month (when 25th is enabled, all dates after are disabled)     In order to change the time, can be done in Settings/Time & Language -> turn off Set time automatically and change the time. Log out/Log in in Application to see the changes
Acceptance Criteria: Actual result: the days after 25th are enabled when the date is greater then 25  Expected result: the days after 25th are disabled, for both scenarios- when present date is greater or less then 25th of the current month)

Title: Not allowing to submit with past dates Other expenses (beside Per Diem) if the current date is greater then 25th
Repro Steps: Not allowing to submit with past dates Other expenses (beside Per Diem) if the current date is greater then 25th PFA video in attachments for reproducing steps Check for current dates being earlier then 25th of the current month, it will allow to submit in past and future not more then 25th Check for current dates being later then 25th of the current month, it will not allow to submit in past
Acceptance Criteria: actual result: If today is later then 25th of the current month, user cannot submit Other Expense with past dates (only as draft) expected result: If today is later then 25th of the current month, user can submit Other Expense with past dates (as Team building, only with different dates)

Title: Case studies generating with unapproved images
Repro Steps: ActualGo to Aura Dev or Prod environment Select create a case study Enter a prompt for any known client Case study will generate with generic stock images (unapproved)  Expected Go to Aura Dev or Prod environment Select create a case study Enter a prompt for any known client Case study will generate using only images from the 'Shared Images' folder (from any of the categories: People, Offices, Gradients, Code)

Title: Image picker scroll is not working in Prod
Repro Steps: Actual  Go to Prod Aura  Generate a new case study or access a saved case study Select 'Change Image' on any of the images User is unable to scroll down to see all of the saved / shared images  Expected  Go to Prod Aura  Generate a new case study or access a saved case study Select 'Change Image' on any of the images User should be able to scroll down in the image picker modal to see all of the available images

Title: Pre-Aura case studies cannot be edited
Repro Steps: Actual Go to 'Approved Case Studies'  Select one of the case studies which was imported from the SharePoint folder of pre-Aura case studies Navigate to a page with a large block of text Select 'Edit' User cannot scroll or make any edits in the text editor modal window  Expected  Go to 'Approved Case Studies'  Select one of the case studies which was imported from the SharePoint folder of pre-Aura case studies Navigate to a page with a large block of text Select 'Edit' User can scroll in the modal window User can make edits to the text Edits cannot be saved until the text is reduced to the existing Aura character limit

Title: Pre-Aura case studies cannot be shared
Repro Steps: Actual Go to 'Approved Case Studies' Select one of the case studies which was imported from the SharePoint folder of pre-Aura case studies Select the 'Share' option to copy the URL Open a new browser tab / window Paste in the share link  User gets a 'Case Study Not Found' error message  Expected  Go to 'Approved Case Studies' Select one of the case studies which was imported from the SharePoint folder of pre-Aura case studies Select the 'Share' option to copy the URL Open a new browser tab / window Paste in the share link  User should see the case study and should be able to make edits to the text and images which should be automatically saved
